languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, разрешите доложить: системы судна в порядке, экипаж работает в штатном режиме. Что касается ксеносов, атаковавших нас..." {n}Голос Вигдис дрожит.{/n} "Мы все в недоумении. Один из осколков поверженного судна доставлен на борт и отправлен машиновидцам для изучения".

"Permission to report, Lord Captain! The ship's systems are in order. The crew is operating as normal. As for the xenos who attacked us..." {n}Vigdis's voice trembles.{/n} "We're all confused here. A fragment of one of the vanquished ships has been brought on board as a trophy and sent to our Enginseers to be studied."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, разрешите доложить: системы судна в порядке, экипаж работает в штатном режиме. Что касается ксеносов, атаковавших нас..." {n}Голос Вигдис дрожит.{/n} "Мы все в недоумении. Один из осколков поверженного судна доставлен на борт и отправлен машиновидцам для изучения".

traits.locale_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain! The ship's systems are in order. The crew is operating as normal. As for the xenos who attacked us..." {n}Vigdis's voice trembles.{/n} "We're all confused here. A shard from the vanquished ship has been brought on board and sent to enginseers to be studied."

"Permission to report, Lord Captain! The ship's systems are in order. The crew is operating as normal. As for the xenos who attacked us..." {n}Vigdis's voice trembles.{/n} "We're all confused here. A shard from the vanquished ship has been brought on board and sent to enginseers to be studied."

"Permission to report, Lord Captain! The ship's systems are in order. The crew is operating as normal. As for the xenos who attacked us..." {n}Vigdis's voice trembles.{/n} "We're all confused here. A shard of the vanquished ship has been brought on board and sent to our enginseers to be studied."

"Permission to report, Lord Captain! The ship's systems are in order. The crew is operating as normal. As for the xenos who attacked us..." {n}Vigdis's voice trembles.{/n} "We're all confused here. A shard of the vanquished ship has been brought on board and sent to our enginseers to be studied."

"Permission to report, Lord Captain! The ship's systems are in order. The crew is operating as normal. As for the xenos who attacked us..." {n}Vigdis's voice trembles.{/n} "We're all confused here. A fragment of one of the vanquished ships has been brought on board as a trophy and sent to our Enginseers to be studied."

languages.text: “请求报告，舰长大人！这艘船的系统一切正常，所有船员也恢复到了正常工作状态。至于袭击我们的异形……”{n}维格迪斯的声音颤抖着。{/n}“我们没有任何线索。被击沉舰船的一部分碎片已经当成战利品带回了船上，我们的技术人员正在进行研究。”
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain! The ship's systems are in order. The crew is operating as normal. As for the xenos who attacked us..." {n}Vigdis's voice trembles.{/n} "We're all confused here. A fragment of one of the vanquished ships has been brought on board as a trophy and sent to our Enginseers to be studied."

traits.locale_text: “请求报告，舰长大人！这艘船的系统一切正常，所有船员也恢复到了正常工作状态。至于袭击我们的异形……”{n}维格迪斯的声音颤抖着。{/n}“我们没有任何线索。被击沉舰船的一部分碎片已经当成战利品带回了船上，我们的技术人员正在进行研究。”

languages.text: « Permission de vous présenter mon rapport, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Les systèmes du vaisseau sont opérationnels. L'équipage a retrouvé son fonctionnement habituel. Quant aux xénos qui nous ont attaqués... nous sommes tous perplexes, {n}déclare Vigdis d'une voix tremblante.{/n} Un fragment du vaisseau vaincu a été rapporté à bord pour servir de trophée et envoyé aux technaugures afin qu'ils l'étudient. »
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain! The ship's systems are in order. The crew is operating as normal. As for the xenos who attacked us..." {n}Vigdis's voice trembles.{/n} "We're all confused here. A fragment of one of the vanquished ships has been brought on board as a trophy and sent to our Enginseers to be studied."

traits.locale_text: « Permission de vous présenter mon rapport, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Les systèmes du vaisseau sont opérationnels. L'équipage a retrouvé son fonctionnement habituel. Quant aux xénos qui nous ont attaqués... nous sommes tous perplexes, {n}déclare Vigdis d'une voix tremblante.{/n} Un fragment du vaisseau vaincu a été rapporté à bord pour servir de trophée et envoyé aux technaugures afin qu'ils l'étudient. »

languages.text: "Bitte um Erlaubnis, Bericht zu erstatten, Lord Captain! Die Systeme des Schiffs laufen ordnungsgemäß. Die Crew arbeitet normal. Und die Xenos, die uns angegriffen haben ..." {n}Vigdis' Stimme zittert.{/n} "Wir sind hier alle verwirrt. Ein Fragment eines der zerstörten Schiffe wurde als Trophäe zur Untersuchung an Bord gebracht unseren Maschinensehern zur Untersuchung überlassen."
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain! The ship's systems are in order. The crew is operating as normal. As for the xenos who attacked us..." {n}Vigdis's voice trembles.{/n} "We're all confused here. A fragment of one of the vanquished ships has been brought on board as a trophy and sent to our Enginseers to be studied."

traits.locale_text: "Bitte um Erlaubnis, Bericht zu erstatten, Lord Captain! Die Systeme des Schiffs laufen ordnungsgemäß. Die Crew arbeitet normal. Und die Xenos, die uns angegriffen haben ..." {n}Vigdis' Stimme zittert.{/n} "Wir sind hier alle verwirrt. Ein Fragment eines der zerstörten Schiffe wurde als Trophäe zur Untersuchung an Bord gebracht unseren Maschinensehern zur Untersuchung überlassen."

"Bitte um Erlaubnis, Bericht zu erstatten, Lord Captain! Die Schiffssysteme laufen ordnungsgemäß. Die Crew arbeitet normal weiter. Und die Xenos, die uns angegriffen haben ..." {n}Vigdis' Stimme zittert.{/n} "Wir sind hier alle verwirrt. Ein Stück des zerstörten Schiffs wurde zur Untersuchung an Bord und zu unseren Maschinensehern gebracht."

languages.text: «¡Permiso para informar, Lord Capitán! Los sistemas de la nave funcionan correctamente y la tripulación realiza sus labores con normalidad. En cuanto a los xenos que nos atacaron...». {n}La voz de Vigdis tiembla.{/n} «Es un tema bastante confuso. Han traído un fragmento de una de las naves que hemos derrotado como trofeo y nuestros visioingenieros están examinándola.»
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain! The ship's systems are in order. The crew is operating as normal. As for the xenos who attacked us..." {n}Vigdis's voice trembles.{/n} "We're all confused here. A fragment of one of the vanquished ships has been brought on board as a trophy and sent to our Enginseers to be studied."

traits.locale_text: «¡Permiso para informar, Lord Capitán! Los sistemas de la nave funcionan correctamente y la tripulación realiza sus labores con normalidad. En cuanto a los xenos que nos atacaron...». {n}La voz de Vigdis tiembla.{/n} «Es un tema bastante confuso. Han traído un fragmento de una de las naves que hemos derrotado como trofeo y nuestros visioingenieros están examinándola.»

languages.text: 「報告の許可を、ロード・キャプテン！船のシステムは正常です。乗組員は通常通り作業しています。攻撃してきた異種族については…」{n}ヴィグディスの声が震える。{/n}「我々は混乱しています。撃退した船の破片の一部が戦利品として船内に持ち込まれ、調査のため機関整備師に送られました」
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain! The ship's systems are in order. The crew is operating as normal. As for the xenos who attacked us..." {n}Vigdis's voice trembles.{/n} "We're all confused here. A fragment of one of the vanquished ships has been brought on board as a trophy and sent to our Enginseers to be studied."

traits.locale_text: 「報告の許可を、ロード・キャプテン！船のシステムは正常です。乗組員は通常通り作業しています。攻撃してきた異種族については…」{n}ヴィグディスの声が震える。{/n}「我々は混乱しています。撃退した船の破片の一部が戦利品として船内に持ち込まれ、調査のため機関整備師に送られました」

languages.text: "Rapor vermek için izninizi isterim Lord Kaptan! Geminin sistemleri, beklentiler dâhilinde çalışıyor. Mürettebat işleri normal seyrinde. Bize saldıran zenolar ise..." {n}Vigdis'in sesi titriyor.{/n} "Açıkçası dumura uğradık. İmha edilen gemilerden birinin bir parçasını ganimet olarak aldık ve incelenmesi için Mühedyumlara gönderdik."
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain! The ship's systems are in order. The crew is operating as normal. As for the xenos who attacked us..." {n}Vigdis's voice trembles.{/n} "We're all confused here. A fragment of one of the vanquished ships has been brought on board as a trophy and sent to our Enginseers to be studied."
